io.smint.clapi.consumer.integration.app.configuration.impl

Class AuthTokenFileStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.smint.clapi.consumer.integration.app.configuration.impl.FileModelStorage<io.smint.clapi.consumer.integration.core.configuration.models.IAuthTokenModel>
      • io.smint.clapi.consumer.integration.app.configuration.impl.AuthTokenFileStorage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.smint.clapi.consumer.integration.core.configuration.IAuthTokenStorage, javax.inject.Provider<io.smint.clapi.consumer.integration.core.configuration.models.IAuthTokenModel>

    @Singleton
public class AuthTokenFileStorage
extends FileModelStorage<io.smint.clapi.consumer.integration.core.configuration.models.IAuthTokenModel>
implements io.smint.clapi.consumer.integration.core.configuration.IAuthTokenStorage
    Stores a IAuthTokenModel to a file and reads the token from the file.

    The format of the file is defined by the instance of IModelStringConverter that is provided to this instance.

    No caching is performed. The token is read from the file with every call to getAuthData() or FileModelStorage.get() over and over again.

      Create a new facade to another token provider, caching its result for improved performance.

        Parameters:
